CustomQueries.AllCustomers: SELECT cust_id, first_nm, last_nm, phone FROM tbl_customers
CustomQueries.ActiveProducts: SELECT product_id, name, code, price FROM tbl_products WHERE price > 0
CustomQueries.RecentOrders: SELECT o.order_id, c.first_nm, c.last_nm, p.name FROM tbl_orders o INNER JOIN tbl_customers c ON o.cust_id = c.cust_id INNER JOIN tbl_products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id
